scripts.generate:run: yarn generate:compile && node -r dotenv/config ./generate/_generate_bundled.js urn_repo=trx urn_hook_types_path=./dist/hooks/types.d.ts urn_output_dir=./generate
scripts.generate:schema: yarn generate:compile && node -r dotenv/config ./generate/_generate_bundled.js urn_repo=trx urn_command=schema
scripts.generate:hooks: yarn generate:compile && node -r dotenv/config ./generate/_generate_bundled.js urn_repo=trx urn_command=hooks urn_output_dir=./generate
scripts.generate:hook-types: yarn generate:compile && node -r dotenv/config ./generate/_generate_bundled.js urn_repo=trx urn_command=hook-types urn_hook_types_path=./dist/hooks/types.d.ts
